json.natural_language_explanation: The genetic algorithm (GA) performed reasonably well, achieving a best fitness value of 0.0026 after 500 iterations, indicating effective exploration of the search space but not reaching the known optimum.

parameter_tuning: Increase population size to 200 for better diversity.
Adjust mutation rate to 0.05 for finer exploration.
alternative_methods: Consider using Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) for potentially faster convergence.
Explore Differential Evolution (DE) for improved performance in continuous spaces.
hybrid_approaches: Combine GA with local search methods for refinement.
